mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This picture is a portrait of N. B. Blackwell and his family. There are 2 other adult men, 3 adult women, and a child. This print was made from the original glass plate negative, which is housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portrait of N. B. Blackwell and Family, 1921 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
